Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Changes the instrument to a piano.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: clarinet(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Changes the instrument to a clarinet.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: frenchHorn(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Changes the instrument to a french horn.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: string(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Changes the instrument to pizzicato strings.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: playAgain(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Plays the current seventh chord again. Calls playChord().

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: next(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Moves on to the next exercise by resetting the buttons and calls setChord().

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: majSChord(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Button turns green if the chord played is a major seventh chord, turns red if not.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: minSChord(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Button turns green if the chord played is a minor seventh chord, turns red if not.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: domChord(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Button turns green if the chord played is a dominant chord, turns red if not.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: hDimChord(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Button turns green if the chord played is a half diminished seventh chord, turns red if not.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: fDimChord(sender:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Button turns green if the chord played is a diminished seventh chord, turns red if not.

Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.name: unwindSegueID(segue:)
Classes/SeventhIdentificationViewControl.abstract: Unwind segue when in the instruction page.
